events.message: I received my order last week, but the product is not what I expected. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of return and refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria Lopez for handling the refund request.
Hello! Iâ€™m Maria from customer support. I understand you want to return your product and get a refund. How can I assist you further today?
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund request promptly?
My order number is 123456789. The product did not match the description on the website, and I am not satisfied with its quality.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a return shipping label for you and issue a full refund once the product is received back at our warehouse.
Thanks for the quick response. That solution works perfectly for me. I will send the product back as soon as I get the label.
We have received your returned product and processed your refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Since your refund has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
